FuncDef: The reset dhcp-server statistics command deletes DHCP packet statistics about a DHCPv4 server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a DHCP server.
This value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If DHCP packet statistics about a DHCPv4 server are unneeded or need to be re-collected, run the reset dhcp-server statistics command to delete the existing DHCP packet statistics about the DHCPv4 server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
